entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
